      • BaseR

        public BaseR(BaseD dataBase,
             myDataset train,
             int ruleWeight,
             int infType,
             int compType)
        Rule Base Constructor
        Parameters:
        dataBase - DataBase the Data Base containing the fuzzy partitions
        train - myDataset the set of training examples
        ruleWeight - int the rule weight heuristic
        infType - int the inference type for the FRM
        compType - int the compatibility type for the t-norm
